summary: Follower, Frost troll with all dialogue.
descriptionHtml:
A Frost Troll follower at 0.75 scale called "Mr. Trollface" who will follow the player.
Note: This mod will replace any animal followers the saved game currently has (a dog and other modded animal followers)
This mod contains frequent cause language towards "Mr. Trollface"

This is just like any other mod Installation: Program files---->Steam---->SteamApps---->common---->Skyrim---->Data---->Just paste the file inside the 'Data' folder.

This mod was made with the help of 'DARFOX127'
DARFOX127, 10/8/2012, Creation kit Tutorial (Animal followers), https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xO6BIZO7oO0
author: Spacemankev95
